titles.title: To prohibit the transportation, treatment, storage, or disposal of hazardous waste outside the State in which the waste was generated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit, after 1993, the transport, treatment, storage, or disposal of hazardous waste outside the State in which such waste was generated.
